## Installation

You can install the development version of cynkralearn like so:

```r
remotes::install_github("cynkra/cynkralearn")
```

## Tutorials

List all available tutorials

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(learnr)
available_tutorials(package = "cynkralearn")
```

Run a specific tutorial

```{r, eval=FALSE}
run_tutorial(
  name = "parallel-1",
  package = "cynkralearn"
)
```
